docComment:
/**
 * Adds support for the cypher query language to Codemirror version 6
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * This package provides a factory function for constructing an {@link cypher-codemirror#EditorApi | EditorApi} instance which wraps a Codemirror 6 instance with cypher language capabilities.
 *
 * @packageDocumentation
 */
name: cypher-codemirror

members.name: AutocompleteChangedListener

members.docComment:
/**
 * @param open - whether the autocomplete menu is open or not
 *
 * @param from - the start cursor position for the suggested options
 *
 * @param options - the list of autocomplete options being suggested to the user
 */

members.name: AutocompleteOption
detail
label
type
AutofocusProp

members.docComment:
/**
 * This function creates a codemirror cypher editor instance
 *
 * @param parentDOMElement - the parent dom element to attach the editor to
 *
 * @param options - the options for the created editor
 *
 * @returns An editor api that wraps the created editor instance
 */
members.name: createCypherEditor

members.docComment:
/**
 * This is the EditorApi interface which wraps all of the interaction with the cypher editor
 *
 * @remarks
 *
 * An instance of this interface is returned by the {@link cypher-codemirror#createCypherEditor | createCypherEditor} function
 */
members.name: EditorApi

 * Set the editor value
 *

members.name: setValue
EditorCreatedListener
EditorOptions

members.docComment:
/**
 * Whether the autocomplete feature is enabled
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * true
 */
members.name: autocomplete

members.docComment:
/**
 * Whether the autocomplete auto closes whenever the editor loses focus
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * true
 */
members.name: autocompleteCloseOnBlur

members.docComment:
/**
 * Whether the autocomplete menu is initially shown to the user
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * false
 */
members.name: autocompleteOpen

members.docComment:
/**
 * The schema - TODO need better docs here and probably rename this
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * undefined
 */
members.name: autocompleteSchema

members.docComment:
/**
 * The keys that when typed will automatically open the autocomplete menu
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * [".",":","[]","()","{}","[","(","{","$"]
 */
members.name: autocompleteTriggerStrings

members.docComment:
/**
 * Whether the editor should be auto focused on first creation
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * true
 */
members.name: autofocus

members.docComment:
/**
 * Whether the editor maintains an undo/redo history
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * true
 */
members.name: history

members.docComment:
/**
 * The formatter for the line numbers of the editor
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * (line, lineCount) => lineCount === 1 ? "$" : line + "";
 */
members.name: lineNumberFormatter

members.docComment:
/**
 * Whether line numbers are shown to the left of the editor ui
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * true
 */
members.name: lineNumbers

members.docComment:
/**
 * Whether the editor wraps lines vs using a horizontal scrollbar
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * false
 */
members.name: lineWrapping

members.docComment:
/**
 * Whether the editor should display lint errors to the user
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * true
 */
members.name: lint

members.docComment:
/**
 * Whether to run the cypher language parser immediately after every call to set the value
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * true
 */
members.name: parseOnSetValue

members.docComment:
/**
 * The text to be shown to the user when the editor value is empty
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * undefined
 */
members.name: placeholder

members.docComment:
/**
 * The initial editor cursor position
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * undefined
 */
members.name: position

members.docComment:
/**
 * The codemirror 6 extensions that should be added to the editor after the cypher language support extensions.
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * undefined
 */
members.name: postExtensions

members.docComment:
/**
 * The codemirror 6 extensions that should be added to the editor before the cypher language support extensions.
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * undefined
 */
members.name: preExtensions

members.docComment:
/**
 * Whether the editor is read only or the user can edit the editor's value
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * false
 */
members.name: readOnly

members.docComment:
/**
 * Whether to show the cursor when the editor readOnly is true
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * false
 */
members.name: readOnlyCursor

members.docComment:
/**
 * Whether to use the light or dark theme for the editor
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * "light"
 */
members.name: theme

members.docComment:
/**
 * The initial editor value
 *
 * @defaultValue
 *
 * ""
 */
members.name: value
